From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To shut down the module, use the **hw-module shutdown** command in privileged EXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

ExtraInfo: This command is supported on the SSL Services Module and the NAM.If you enter the hw-module **shutdown** command to shut down the module, you will have to enter the no power enable module command and the **power enable module** command to restart (power down and then power up) the module.
